element.name: S1 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: medial - to multifidus, lateral - cutaneous branches, supply skin of gluteal region

element.name: S1 nerve, ventral ramus
element.distribution: 1 - common peroneal part of sciatic nerve, 2 - tibial part of sciatic nerve, 3 - posterior cutaneous nerve of thigh

element.name: S2 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: medial - to multifidus, lateral - cutaneous branches, supply skin of gluteal region

element.name: S2 nerve, ventral ramus
element.distribution: 1 - common peroneal part of sciatic nerve, 2 - tibial part of sciatic nerve, 3 - pudendal nerve, 4 - nerve to piriformis, 5 - viscera

element.name: S3 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: medial - to multifidus, lateral - cutaneous branches, supply skin of gluteal region

element.name: S3 nerve, ventral ramus
element.distribution: 1 - visceral branch, 2 - join pudendal nerve, 3 - join perforating cutanaeous nerve, 4 - join posterior cutaneous nerve of thigh, 5 - join common peroneal part of sciatic nerve

element.name: S4 nerve
element.branches: dorsal - medial, lateral; ventral - muscular branches

element.name: S4 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: medial - to multifidus, lateral - cutaneous branches, supply skin of gluteal region

element.name: S4 nerve, ventral ramus
element.distribution: nerve to levator ani, nerve to coccygeus, nerve to external anal sphincter

element.name: S5 nerve
element.branches: dorsal - medial, lateral; ventral - muscular branches

element.name: CX nerve
element.branches: dorsal - medial, lateral; ventral - muscular branches
